Locating input by label

Source: R/infra.R
rplaywright_page_getbylabel.Rd

Allows locating input elements by the text of the associated

Usage

rplaywright_page_getbylabel(page, args = list(), actions = list())

Arguments

page

Page instance

args

List of as defined in https://playwright.dev/docs/api/class-page#page-get-by-label

actions

List of actions as defined in https://playwright.dev/docs/api/class-locator, such as fill (https://playwright.dev/docs/api/class-locator#locator-fill)

Details

<input aria-label="Username" /> <label for="password-input">Password:</label> <input id="password-input" />

Examples

rplaywright::rplaywright_page_getbylabel(page, args = list(text = "Username"), actions = list(fill = list("john")))
#> Error in rplaywright::rplaywright_page_getbylabel(page, args = list(text = "Username"),     actions = list(fill = list("john"))): 'page' is not a page instance
rplaywright::rplaywright_page_getbylabel(page, args = list(text = "Password"), actions = list(fill = list("password")))
#> Error in rplaywright::rplaywright_page_getbylabel(page, args = list(text = "Password"),     actions = list(fill = list("password"))): 'page' is not a page instance
